definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Theres a reason people cant wait for Christmas, and it haslittle to do with family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 人們等不及過聖誕節的理由和家人團聚沒有任何關係。

sentences.english: Sales are poor this month. There may, however, be an increase before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 這個月銷量很差，但聖誕節前可能會增加。

sentences.english: It's a tradition to sing "Jingle Bells" at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節唱《鈴兒響叮噹》是一種傳統。

sentences.english: But this one was a Christmas emergency.
sentences.chinese: 但這的確是個聖誕節急診。

sentences.english: Theatres put on special shows for children during the Christmas season.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節期間劇院爲兒童舉行專場演出。

sentences.english: in the New Year. We wish the merriest of Christmas to you and your loved
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節轉眼又到，又該迎接新的一年了。

sentences.english: The holy tide of Christmas all other doth deface .
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節的聖潮，其他的一切將被感染。

sentences.english: There was hope that the war could end by Christmas, December twenty-fifth.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭有望在十二月25號，即聖誕節之前結束。

sentences.english: Wish you lots of love, joy &happiness. happy christmas.
sentences.chinese: 祝願你擁有更多的愛與幸福，聖誕節快樂。

sentences.english: And so that's how we spent our first Christmas here,
sentences.chinese: 我們就是這樣在這兒度過我們的第一個聖誕節的。

sentences.english: Christmas is a time for gladness and rejoicing ...because there is no class.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節是歡喜和快樂的時光，因爲不用上課。

sentences.english: A few days after Christmas, my six year sonI were talking.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節過後的一天，六歲的兒子和我在聊天。

sentences.english: My house has smartened up for the Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我家已裝飾一新以迎接聖誕節。

sentences.english: It's difficult not to get bogged down because everything tells me Christmas is coming.
sentences.chinese: 不受影響還真不易，由於統統都報告我聖誕節到臨了。

definition: to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
